name: Color Stepper
description:
A simple game in which you have to step on right cubes in order to improve your score.

How to play:
Get the highest score before time runs out. Orange plates give 1 point, teal are neutral and give 0 points, blackish plates are bad and give -1 point. Do it in a streak to multiply your gains! (yep you can also multiply a bad streak).   After every 3 moves made by you, the map will shift left, destroying the leftmost plates and creating new ones.

Controls:
WSAD or Arrows to move.
Esc to quit.
